text: In the previous Lincoln Yards plan, the tallest tower was 650 feet. Now it's 595 feet--a minor league haircut. The reduction in density--from 15 million square feet to 14.5 million square feet--is equally trivial. You and DPD aren't fooling anyone with these tweaks.
text_html: In the previous Lincoln Yards plan, the tallest tower was 650 feet. Now it's 595 feet--a minor league haircut. The reduction in density--from 15 million square feet to 14.5 million square feet--is equally trivial. You and DPD aren't fooling anyone with these tweaks.

text: Stores that people go to regularly to buy food don’t need help from the city. They use the money that people give them for food to pay for the facility and payroll.

text: Poverty is the result of being reliant on the government to achieve what middle class people achieve through hard work. If you learn from a young age that everything comes to you for free regardless of whether you work, that is a guarantor of poverty. Hunger lights a fire within.
